executive_summary:
EXECUTIVE SUMMARY

This automated security audit evaluated 5 applicable SOC 2 Type II controls using industry-standard SAST, SCA, and secrets detection tools.

COMPLIANCE OVERVIEW:
• Overall Compliance Rate: 20.0%
• Fully Compliant Controls: 1 (20.0% of applicable controls)
• Non-Compliant Controls: 2 (40.0% of applicable controls)  
• Controls Requiring Review: 2 (40.0% of applicable controls)

RISK ASSESSMENT:
• RISK LEVEL: CRITICAL - Extensive non-compliance requiring urgent action

detailed_findings.remediation_notes: Control CC6.1 has 3 findings. IMMEDIATE REMEDIATION REQUIRED: Review access controls, encryption, and authentication mechanisms.
Control CC6.2 has 2 findings. REVIEW RECOMMENDED: Review access controls, encryption, and authentication mechanisms.
Control CC6.3 has 3 findings. IMMEDIATE REMEDIATION REQUIRED: Review access controls, encryption, and authentication mechanisms.
Control is compliant. Continue current security practices and monitor regularly.
Control CC7.2 has 3 findings. REVIEW RECOMMENDED: Review access controls, encryption, and authentication mechanisms.

recommendations: IMMEDIATE ACTION: Address 2 controls with critical security findings. These represent severe security vulnerabilities requiring urgent remediation.
HIGH PRIORITY: Remediate 4 controls with high-severity findings within 30 days.
COMPLIANCE REMEDIATION: 2 controls are currently non-compliant. Develop remediation plans with defined timelines and responsible parties.
Implement automated security scanning in CI/CD pipelines to prevent regression.
Establish regular security audit cycles (quarterly recommended).
Provide security training to development teams on secure coding practices.
Document all remediation efforts for audit trail purposes.
Consider engaging security consultants for complex compliance requirements.

attestation.auditor_statement: This security audit was conducted using AuditHound automated scanning tools in accordance with SOC 2 Type II 2017 controls.
attestation.methodology: Automated static analysis using Bandit, Semgrep, Safety, TruffleHog, and Checkov scanners
attestation.scope: Source code and infrastructure analysis of .
attestation.limitations: This automated audit covers technical controls only. Manual review of business processes and physical controls is recommended.
